title: Selim's Portfolio
label: Select another language!
aboutme1:
Hello, my name is Selim JEAN-BAPTISTE-SIMONE, a passionate and creative fullstack web developer currently working at RICOH FRANCE.

With several years of experience, I specialize in building robust and scalable web applications. I have expertise in various technologies.
My approach to development focuses on creatingseamless and intuitive userexperiences. I strongly believe in following best development practices, resulting in clean, well-structured, and maintainable code.
Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work on multiple projects, ranging from dynamic website design to complex web applications. I have gained valuable experience in managing the entire development lifecycle, from initial design to production deployment and maintenance.

I am constantly staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the web development field. Continuous learning is a priority for me to ensure that I maintain my skills and provide the best solutions to my clients.


I invite you to explore my portfolio to discover some of the exciting projects I have worked on my spare time. You will find demonstrations of my technical skills and my contact informations


Feel free to contact me to discuss your ideas and web development needs.
exp0_desc: Development of several applications for clients with dematerialization or desktop publishing needs. NodeJS,React,Angular,C#,Ruby
exp1_desc: Development of new internal CRM functionalities. Development of an API linked to the internal CRM linking the mobile application for the sales fleet. Development of a statistics for the commercial fleet. In charge of CRM features development and management of commercial websites. PHP,Javascript
exp2_desc: Development of a physical mail sending application in PHP and development of a file sending solution through print driver in Batch(Windows).
exp3_desc: Development of a web application in Python/Django to improve stadium ticket sales.
